segments.content: An important TypeScript release that will allow React to be able to declare its own valid JSX types. It is planned to use this new feature as soon as possible in React typedefs, which have already been [forked](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/65126) to continue to support older versions (TypeScript \<= 5.0).
segments.sourceMdx: An important TypeScript release that will allow React to be able to declare its own valid JSX types. It is planned to use this new feature as soon as possible in React typedefs, which have already been [forked](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/65126) to continue to support older versions (TypeScript \<= 5.0).
segments.translated_content: 这个重要的 TypeScript 版本将允许 React 声明自己的有效 JSX 类型。React 类型定义已[分叉](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/65126)以继续支持旧版本（TypeScript ≤ 5.0），并计划尽快采用此新特性。

segments.content:
* the ability to use a React Server Component `async` in JSX without TypeScript errors or [workaround](https://gist.github.com/cramforce/b5e3f0b103f841d2e5e429b1d5ac4ded).
* the ability to return all valid types for `ReactNode` (string, array, boolean...) without needing a fragment ([details](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1648619398259769344)).
* other interesting improvements around JSX: namespaced attributes and linked editing (VSCode).

- 在 JSX 中使用 React Server Component 的 `async` 而不会触发 TypeScript 错误或需要[变通方案](https://gist.github.com/cramforce/b5e3f0b103f841d2e5e429b1d5ac4ded)
- 返回所有有效的 `ReactNode` 类型（字符串、数组、布尔值等）而无需片段（[详情](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1648619398259769344)）
- 其他 JSX 相关改进：命名空间属性和联动编辑（VSCode）

segments.content: React-Query will remove the callbacks (`onSuccess`, `onError`, `onSettled`) from the `useQuery` hook with v5. Dominik explains this choice and suggest alternatives more adapted to common cases, like displaying a toast. A controversial but necessary decision because these APIs were often misused. Note: callbacks are kept for `useMutation`.
segments.sourceMdx: React-Query will remove the callbacks (`onSuccess`, `onError`, `onSettled`) from the `useQuery` hook with v5. Dominik explains this choice and suggest alternatives more adapted to common cases, like displaying a toast. A controversial but necessary decision because these APIs were often misused. Note: callbacks are kept for `useMutation`.
segments.translated_content: React-Query 将在 v5 版本中移除 `useQuery` 钩子的回调函数（`onSuccess`、`onError`、`onSettled`）。Dominik 解释了这一决定，并针对常见场景（如显示 toast 通知）提出了更合适的替代方案。虽然这个决定存在争议，但由于这些 API 经常被误用，这一变更是必要的。注：`useMutation` 的回调函数仍会保留。
